entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1000 metres rising to 1300 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain or wet snow beginning after midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or wet snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
